verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3485>temple,<s%> <S%G3004>saying<s%> to the <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G32>angels,<s%> <S%G5217>"Go<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> pour <S%G1632>out<s%> the seven <S%G5357>bowls<s%> of the <S%G2372>wrath<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G4413>first<s%> <S%G565>went,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>into<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> a <S%G2556>harmful<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G1668>sore<s%> <S%G1519>on<s%> the <S%G444>people<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G5480>mark<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G4352>worshiped<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1504>image.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1208>second<s%> <S%G32>angel<s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2281>sea,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> it <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> of a <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2532>man.<s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G5590>thing<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%> <S%G599>died.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4215>rivers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G4077>springs<s%> of <S%G5204>water,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G1096>became<s%> <S%G129>blood.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> the <S%G32>angel<s%> of the <S%G5204>waters<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G1342>righteous,<s%> who <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> who <S%G2258>were,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3741><s%> you Holy <S%G2962>One,<s%> <S%G3754>because<s%> you have <S%G2919>judged<s%> these <S%G5023>things.<s%>

<S%G3754>For<s%> they <S%G1632>poured<s%> out the <S%G129>blood<s%> of the <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> you have <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> to <S%G4095>drink.<s%> <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1526>They<s%> deserve <S%G514>this.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G243><s%> <S%G1537>the<s%> <S%G2379>altar<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty,<s%> <S%G228>true<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1342>righteous<s%> are <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G2920>judgments.<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G5067>fourth<s%> <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2246>sun,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2739>it<s%> was <S%G1325>given<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> to <S%G2739>scorch<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4442>fire.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G444>People<s%> were <S%G2739>scorched<s%> with <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2738>heat,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> people <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G3686>name<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%> <S%G1909>over<s%> <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G4127>plagues.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> and <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1391>glory.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3991>fifth<s%> <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G2362>throne<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G4656>darkened.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3145>gnawed<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1100>tongues<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of the <S%G4192>pain,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%> <S%G1537>because<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G4192>pains<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G1537>sores.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> They <S%G3756>didn't<s%> <S%G3340>repent<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1623>sixth<s%> <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4215>river,<s%> the <S%G2166>Euphrates.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G846>Its<s%> <S%G5204>water<s%> was dried <S%G3583>up,<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> might be <S%G2090>prepared<s%> for the <S%G935>kings<s%> that come <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2246>the<s%> <S%G395>sunrise.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I <S%G1492>saw<s%> coming out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G1404>dragon,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the <S%G2342>beast,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4750>mouth<s%> of the false <S%G5578>prophet,<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> something <S%G3664>like<s%> <S%G944>frogs;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%> of <S%G1142>demons,<s%> <S%G4160>performing<s%> <S%G4592>signs;<s%> which go <S%G1607>forth<s%> <S%G3739%G99999><s%> <S%G1909>to<s%> the <S%G935>kings<s%> <S%G2532><s%> of the <S%G3650>whole<s%> inhabited <S%G3625>earth,<s%> to <S%G4863>gather<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> together <S%G1519>for<s%> the <S%G4171>war<s%> of <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> the <S%G3841>Almighty.<s%>

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief.<s%> <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is <S%G3588>he<s%> who <S%G1127>watches,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5083>keeps<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>clothes,<s%> so that he <S%G3363>doesn't<s%> <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G1131>naked,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G808>shame.<s%>"
<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G4863>gathered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G4863>together<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> which is <S%G2564>called<s%> in <S%G1447>Hebrew,<s%> <S%G717>Megiddo.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G1442>seventh<s%> <S%G32><s%> poured <S%G1632>out<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5357>bowl<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G109>air.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> A <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> forth <S%G575>out<s%> of the <S%G3485>temple<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven,<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2362>throne,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> "It is <S%G1096>done!<s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> There <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G796>lightnings,<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G5456>sounds,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1027>thunders;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1096>was<s%> a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> such <S%G3634>as<s%> <S%G1096>was<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G575>since<s%> <S%G3739><s%> there <S%G1096>were<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1093>earth,<s%> so <S%G3173>great<s%> an <S%G4578>earthquake,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G5082>mighty.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G1096>divided<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G3313>parts,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4172>cities<s%> of the <S%G1484>nations<s%> <S%G4098>fell.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G897>Babylon<s%> the <S%G3173>great<s%> was <S%G3415>remembered<s%> in the <S%G1799>sight<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> to <S%G1325>give<s%> to <S%G846>her<s%> the <S%G4221>cup<s%> of the <S%G3631>wine<s%> of the <S%G2372>fierceness<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3709>wrath.<s%>
<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G3520>island<s%> fled <S%G5343>away,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3735>mountains<s%> <S%G2147>were<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2147>found.<s%>

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G3173>Great<s%> <S%G5464>hailstones,<s%> <S%G5613>about<s%> the weight of a <S%G5006>talent,<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G444>people.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G444>People<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> because <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G4127>plague<s%> of the <S%G5464>hail,<s%> <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G846>this<s%> <S%G4127>plague<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G4970>exceedingly<s%> <S%G3173>severe.<s%>
